name: Jeeran Holdings
description: Provider of an online review management platform intended to bring the culture of reviews to the emerging world, empower individuals and enrich online local content. The company's online review management platform includes a million places listed from ten cities generating tens of thousands of reviews, enabling users users to interact better with places in their cities.
